title: Paramount Claims Netflix-Warner Bros. Merger is "Unlawful" in Letter to Lawmakers
full_text: Paramount Claims Netflix-Warner Bros. Merger is "Unlawful" in Letter to Lawmakers. Warner Bros. rejected Paramount’s offer eight times, and now a letter has been filed to lawmakers in an effort to stop the Netflix and WBD merger.. After Warner Bros. rejected Paramounts offer eight times and instead sided with Netflixs initial deal, a letter has been filed to lawmakers in an effort to cement Paramounts offer before Netflix and … [+2048 chars]
